author: sargeantfury
content: Just another day in your life with making no money on apple...

author: Pepe
content: KeyBank Analyst a traditionally Apple Short had to admit that iPhone 16 is selling better than he expected. Year of a year sales of iPhone 16 in October has a plus of 8% . And folks don’t forget this is without all the AI capability coming next month& and months to follow. How can someone be so wrong if it’s his job to to analyze a company? With other words, KeyBank, please fire this guy.

author: Pepe
content: Bullish: Slow and steady . Exactly what we love

author: Your retirement is shrinking
content: Conflicts and turmoil often translate into instability and uncertainty for the global economy, including the stock market. The threat or actual commencement of war can spark a sharp sell-off in stocks and equities, causing numerous investors to pull their money out of these investments

author: Anna
content: Holding since 2010. $AAPL made me more money than any other stock. Planning to hold through 2030 unless something drastically changes.

author: Jaxen
content: Their India expansion is a masterstroke. Massive untapped market for premium smartphones. Expect huge growth here over the next decade.

author: Jay
content: $AAPL is dead money short term. Trading sideways while the market pumps. Thinking about rotating into NVDA or TSLA for higher momentum.

author: Fletcher
content: Apple’s ecosystem is a golden cage. Once you’re in, you’re locked. That’s why I’m staying long—subscription revenue will only grow.
